description.en: Ecchan, a second-year elementary school student, fell in love with tennis because she admired her older sister, who was a coach at the Kawai Tennis Club. Although her form is a mess of what she sees, her sister's amazing tennis talent blossoms when she joins her older sister at a tennis club. However, the ninja-like female player, Kirigakure Kasumi, comes along and Ecchan is completely defeated. Later, she will have a competitive match at Kawai Tennis Club and Iga Tennis Club...? !

biography.en:
藤原栄子

Debuted in 1965 encouraged by her teacher YOKOYAMA Masamichi and became especially popular during the 70s. Her masterpiece is "Uwasa no Himeko", published for over more than 10 years with a total of 31 volumes. She created the original character draft for the anime "Mahou Shoujo Lalabel", as well as some special chapters and illustrations for its manga version and that of "La Seine no Hoshi", which were never compiled for tankoubon.
